TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 將擴充屬性的介面定義至容器 (Container) 中的其他元件。

span.span: Defines the interface for extending properties to other components in a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充性提供者是一個元件，提供給其他元件的屬性。An extender provider is a component that provides properties to other components. 比方說，控制項是擴充性提供者。For example, the control is an extender provider. 當您將加入控制對，在表單上的其他所有控制項都有屬性新增至他們的屬性清單。When you add a control to a , all other controls on the form have a property added to their list of properties. 提供擴充項屬性的任何元件必須實作。Any component that provides extender properties must implement . 視覺化設計工具就可以呼叫來判斷哪一個容器中的物件應接收擴充項屬性。A visual designer can then call to determine which objects in a container should receive the extender properties. 如需有關擴充性提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 實作擴充性提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe)。For more information about extender providers, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作介面。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface. 這個範例屬於較大的範例所述[如何： 實作 HelpLabel 擴充性提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d)。This example is part of a larger example discussed in [How to: Implement a HelpLabel Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel/CS/HelpLabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel/VB/HelpLabel.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanExtend(object extendee) cil managed
Public Function CanExtend (extendee As Object) As Boolean

span.span: The to receive the extender properties.

summary.span: 指定這個物件是否可以將它的擴充項屬性提供給指定的物件。

span.span: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.

returns.span: 如果這個物件能夠提供擴充項屬性給指定的物件則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關擴充項屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作擴充性提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe)。For more information on extender properties, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property. 這個範例屬於較大的範例所述[如何： 實作 HelpLabel 擴充性提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d)。This example is part of a larger example discussed in [How to: Implement a HelpLabel Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d).
